text: de shortness of breath (dyspnea), a cough that won't go away, and chest pain. Some people feel very tired, uneasy, or depressed. Night sweats and weight loss are also common.      Sarcoidosis can also cause the following:   Skin rashes, ulcers or discoloration   Joint stiffness or pain   Enlarged lymph nodes   Enlarged liver or spleen   Vision problems, eye dryness or irritation   Headaches, seizures, or weakness on one side of the face   Aches and pains in the muscles and bones   Abnormal heart
